Тот же глагол, что в (68) -- пересечь (но другая модель управления). Сам глагол значит "идти".  There is an (optional) adverb (meädda / åålǥas) in this example. Something like 'away/to.outside', but I do not treat it as part of a phrasal verb (nor as part of dependent marking)

back_translation_en: ‘P. is driving the cow (to the pasture).’
